author: Odeinoichus
title: Whose got that spirited disposition?
review:
Set #71012 Donald Duck: The little sailor duck joins the cast of Disney CMF and he's everything you could have wanted in a LEGO minifigure.

Donald uses the same basic techniques as Daisy, and all of the same pieces except for his hat, which plugs in where the bow would on Daisy's head. He also includes no accessories and limited printing, as well as dual-molded legs. Donald has a bit more printing with his bow tie, sleeve markings and the back printing for detailing on his outfit. There's really not much more to say.

Donald is strongly recommended, he's just a huge favorite character of mine and unlike Daisy I'm really impressed with him. Both of them together compliment each other very nicely. Again strongly recommended.
